about_the_game:
EXPLORE ULTIMA, THE CITY OF ROBOT NIGHTMARES


The Concrete corporation enforces total control over Ultima City and its sentient robot inhabitants. The corporate tower is both their home and their prison. They live condemned to a life of servitude to Entropy, the human CEO, and Concrete’s profits.

The most vicious oppression is reserved for those living in the bottom sector of the tower, working on hazardous industrial facilities. At the lowest floor of the tower, an enslaved construction bot waits for the opportunity to enact his vengeance on his creators.

FIGHT FOR YOUR FREEDOM, GET REVENGE


Take control of Asimov, an old robot armed with a giant loading claw, a deadly arsenal of weapons and endless rage. Perform never-ending gun and claw combos while dodging enemy fire in challenging combat encounters.

Together with Salvador, your virus companion, you’ll climb the giant corporate tower in an effort to destroy the Concrete corporation and obtain freedom. Fight through each floor of the tower, each one flooded with security bots and overseen by a powerful boss. Face Entropy and get revenge!
The combat system features:
  • A dynamic weapon arsenal - each gun launches enemies in different directions, combine them to perform stylish combos!
  • Non-stop gun action- recover ammo by switching weapons and never stop shooting.
  • Aggressive melee combat - punch, uppercut and air combo your enemies to recover armor. Aggression keeps you alive.
  • Your enemy is your weapon - grab any enemy with your loading claw to use their gun or throw them at each other with great force.
  • Combo-fueled finishers - long and flashy combos allow you to use powerful finishers, like giant lasers or burning plasma explosions!

OPTIMIZE YOUR CAPACITY FOR VIOLENCE


Fight against increasingly challenging hordes of enemies in the Arena Mode and boost your score with intricate combos and combat prowess.
Climb the ranks of the global leaderboard, and compete against your friends for the best highscore.

content_descriptors.notes:
Payloaders Strike! features frequent violence towards other robots of your own kind.
The characters make frequent use of adult language.

short_description: Payloaders Strike! is a first person action game that mixes stylish combos with lightning fast mobility and gunplay. Combine your gun attacks with melee punches and throws to overwhelm your opponents. Lead the rebellion against the corporation that enslaved you and liberate all of robot-kind!
